name: Zombies Hunter - Shooting Game
description:
Let's go zombie hunting! Get through the levels by shooting your way through them.

Zombies Hunter is an action adventure game in a world riddled by a zombie invasion! Collect coins, destroy zombies and see how far you can go. Save up to get new characters.

Zombies Hunter is a completely free game to play!

Download now, and get ready to kick some rotten zombie butt!
